head.rb

Path: rails-2.3.2/actionpack/lib/action_controller/vendor/rack-1.0/rack/head.rb
Last Update: Sun Mar 15 23:31:32 -0500 2009

Source Code

module Rack

class Head
  def initialize(app)
    @app = app
  end

  def call(env)
    status, headers, body = @app.call(env)

    if env["REQUEST_METHOD"] == "HEAD"
      [status, headers, []]
    else
      [status, headers, body]
    end
  end
end

end
